title: Pixel 4A - Lock Screen Disappeared
content:
Hi All,

I have not set any Pin/Pattern password to open my Pixel 4A. It is simple swipe up from lock screen to unlock.
But since yesterday, I do not see the lock screen. As soon as I double tap or press power button, the phone opens directly in unlock mode.
I have searched everywhere under Settings but can't find any disable/enable button for this.
Plz help.
